This producer writes in a topic each line (form : "timestamp;value") of a datafile continuously and periodically.
Clustering
 
CodeConnectors
Class that makes the connection between R and Java
CuSumDetector
Detector based in Cumulative Sum (cusum) algorithm Detection based on the whole accumulated data https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
CuSumDetectorOnLine
Online detector based in Cumulative Sum (cusum) algorithm Detection based on the current data https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)

ProducerMain
Launches STREAMER producer (data ingester) Its function is to push data in a topic(s) continuously and periodically.
QuantileSummary
Class that implements the weighted quantile sketch algorithm ( https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf )
RawRecord
class that implements a raw record with specified fields needed for real time record simulation based on old records.

Class for the real time record simulation

TextExtractor
 
ThresholdDetector
Detector based in thresholds Per observed metric: When the value goes above a specified threshold (absolute value) for more than robustness iterations, an alarm is raised https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
TimeRecord
Class that implements a time record
TimeStampProducer
This producer writes in a topic each line (form : "timestamp;value") of a datafile continuously and periodically.
Trainer
Train an algorithm (setup in algs.props) Data obtained from database or from a file (path specified in streaming.props) *
